verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice, give thanks, and sing!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bright youth and snow-crowned age, both men and women, raise on high your free, exulting song, declare God's wondrous praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With voice as full and strong As oceanâ€™s surging praise, Send forth the hymns our fathers loved, The psalms of ancient days.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With all the angel choirs, With all the saints of earth, Pour out the strains of joy and bliss, True rapture, noblest mirth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Still lift your standard high, Still march in firm array, As warriors through the darkness toil, Till dawns the golden day.{/lang-eng}
